name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>念<rt>ねん</rt></ruby><ruby>銃<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>ヴァロン

text.en:
2 Level 5 monsters
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-down card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Vallon, the Psychic Skyblaster" once per turn.
